messages.subject: VERY URGENT BUSINESS
messages.body:
FROM LEONARD KUJO,
COTONOU, BENIN REPUBLIC.
PHONE#    871-76-2535865
FAX#      871-76-2535866
Dear Sir,
In order to transfer out (USD 45 MILLION) Forty Five million United States
Dollars) from  MIDDLE BANK OF AFRICA BENIN [MBA]. I have the courage to ask
for your assistance to handle this important and confidential business
believing that you will never let me down either now or in future. I am MR
LEONARD KUJO,the MANAGER of MIDDLE BANK OF AFRICA, BENIN [M.B.A]. There is
an account opened in this bank in 1980 and since 1990 nobody has operated on
this account again. After going through some old files in the records, I
discovered that if I do not remit this money out urgently it will be
forfeited for nothing. The owner of this account is Mr. DESTIN PAL, a
foreigner, and a miner at KRUGER GOLD CO., a geologist by profession and he
died since 1990. No other person knows about this account or any thing
concerning it, the account has no other beneficiary and my investigation
proved to me as well that this company does not know anything about this
account and the amount involved is!
(USD 45M) .  I want to transfer the [USD45M] Forty Five million United
States Dollars into a safe foreigners account abroad , but I don't know any
foreigner, I am only contacting you as a foreigner because this money can
not be approved to a local bank here, but can only be approved to any
foreign account because the money is in us dollars and the former owner of
the account is Mr.DESTIN PAL is a foreigner too. I know that this message
will come to you as a surprise as we dont know our selves before,but be
sure that it is real and a genuine business. I only got your contact address
from my secretary who operates computer with believe in God that you will
never let me down in this business. You are the only person that I have
contacted in this business, so please reply urgently so that I will inform
you the next step to take urgently. Send also your private telephone and fax
number including the full details of the account to be used for the deposit.
I want us to meet face!
to face or sign a binding agreement to bind us together so that you c
an receive this money into a foreign account or any account of your choice
where the fund will be safe. I will fly to your country for withdrawal and
sharing and other investments. I am contacting you because of the need to
involve a foreigner with foreign account and foreign beneficiary. I need
your full co-operation to make this work fine because the management is
ready to approve this payment to any foreigner who has correct information
of this account, which I will give to you later immediately, if you are able
and with capability to handle such amount in strict confidence and trust
according to my instructions and advice for our mutual benefit because this
opportunity will never come again in my life. I need truthful person in this
business because I don't want to make mistake I need your strong assurance
and trust. With my position now in the office I can transfer this money to
any foreigner's reliable account, which you can provide with assurance that
this money will !
be intact pending my physical arrival in your country for sharing. I will
destroy all documents of transaction immediately we receive this money
leaving no trace to any place. You can also come to discuss with me face to
face after which I will make this remittance in your presence and two of us
will fly to your country so at least two days ahead of the money going into
the account. I will apply for annual leave to get visa immediately I hear
from you that you are ready to act and receive this fund in your account.
I will use my position and influence to effect legal approvals and onward
transfer of this money to your account with appropriate clearance forms of
the ministries and foreign exchange departments. At the conclusion of this
business, you will be given 35% of the total amount, 60% will be for me,
while 5% will be for expenses both parties might have incurred during the
process of transferring. I look forward to your earliest reply.
My Contact info;
PHONE#:(871)-762535865,
FAX#: (871}-762535866,
COTONOU BENIN REPUBLIC

Yours Truly,
LEONARD KUJO

messages.subject: VERY URGENT BUSINESS
messages.body:
Dear Mr LEONARD KUJO

Where did you get my email address from?

I'm sure I can help you. What do I have to do to assist?

Funny, only just this morning I found out that the Church roof will cost £500,000 to
renovate. Also Mrs Donkeykong, my good friend, informs me that she desperately needs
a new car.

So you email came at exactly the right time and so I'm certain it is a sign from our
Heavenly Father. You will be pleased, I am sure, that some of this money will be
going to assist in the Lord's work.

I look forward to helping you.

Rev. Wally Tightnuts

messages.subject: Re: VERY URGENT BUSINESS
messages.body:
DEAR Rev. Wally Tightnuts,

I SINCERELY APOLOGISE FOR MY LATE REPLY,THIS WAS BECAUSE I WENT FOR BOARD MEETING AT
PORT NOVO,WHICH MADE ME TO RESPOND LATE.

THANKS FOR YOUR READINESS TO WORK THIS TRANSACTION WITH ME. NOTE THAT AS YOU ARE
HELPING ME, YOU ARE ALSO HELPING YOURSELF BECAUSE AT THE END, YOU WILL GAIN
IMMENSELY. I WANT YOU TO SEE THIS TRANSACTION AS A COLLECTIVE RESPONSIBILITY OF BOTH
OF US. WE BOTH STAND TO GAIN.

ANYWAY,I GOT YOUR ADDRESS FROM MY NATIONAL LIBRARY ON WHOS WHO JOURNAL WITH THE HELP
OF GOD E.I AM DOING THIS, WITH TRUST AND BELEIVING THAT IT IS ONLY ONE DAY THAT ONE
CAN KNOW EACH OTHER. I ALSO BELEIVE THAT YOU WILL NEVER LET ME DOWN EITHER NOW OR IN
FUTURE.

I WILL CERTAINLY VISIT YOUR COUNTRY. INFACT I AM COMING THERE WITH MY FAMILY TO
SETTLE AFTER THIS TRANSACTION. I WOULD HAVE LOVED TO VISIT YOU NOW BUT IT CANNOT BE
POSSIBLE BECAUSE.

1: I MUST MAKE SURE THAT THE MONEY IS SAFE IN YOUR ACCOUNT BEFORE I TRAVEL OUT.

2: AS YOU KNOW, I MUST RESIGN BEFORE I TRAVEL OUT BECAUSE AS A CIVIL SERVANT I
CANNOT OPERATE FOREIGN ACCOUNT OR INVEST ABROAD WHILE STILL WORKING WITH THE  BANK
HERE.

3: MY ANNUAL LEAVE COMES UP END OF  FEBUARY AND WE CANNOT WAIT TILL THEN BEFORE
CONCLUDING THIS TRANSACTION.

4: DUE TO THE NATURE OF THIS TRANSACTION I HAVE TO BE HERE TO MONITOR ALL
PROCEEDINGS AND TAKE CARE OF ANY EVENTUALITY. SO MY TRAVELLING TO MEET YOU IN YOUR
COUNTRY OR ANYWHERE WILL BE BETTER DONE AFTER THE TRANSACTION AND I MUST HAVE MADE
SURE THAT YOU HAVE THE MONEY SAFELY IN YOUR ACCOUNT.

MORE INFORMATION:

1- I MUST ASSURE YOU THAT THIS BUSINESS IS LEGAL, RISK FREE AND TROUBLE FREE AS I
HOPE TO ESTABLISH A STRONG LONG LASTING BUSINESS AND FAMILY RELATIONSHIP WITH YOU.




I WANT YOU TO DECIDE WHOLE HEARTEDLY THAT YOU ARE READY TO WORK WITH ME. THE
TRANSACTION IS NOT BY FORCE BUT CONFIDENTIAL WITHOUT PREJUDICE.

2- THE TRANSACTION NEEDS URGENCY, TRUTH, TRUST,SINCERITY AND COMMITMENT. FOR US TO
SUCCEED, THESE PRINCIPLES MUST BE OBSERVED.

3- I WANT YOU TO SEND YOUR COMPLETE ADDRESS AND YOUR NOMINATED ACCOUNT INFORMATION
WHERE THE MONEY WILL BE TRANSFERRED. I NEED ALSO YOUR PHONE AND FAX NRS FOR
EMERGENCY COMMUNICATION BECAUSE AT TIMES THE INTERNET SERVER FAILS HERE.

AS SOON AS YOU REPLY BACK,I WILL SEND YOU MY ID/PASSPORT COPIES, STATEMENT OF THE
ACCOUNT AND DEATH CERTIFICATE OF LATE MR DESTIN PAL. THEY ARE FOR YOUR
CONFIRMATION,TRUSTH AND MORE FAMILIARITY.

THE DEATH CERTIFICATE OF LATE MR DESTIN PAL WAS RETRIVED  FROM GENERAL HOSPITAL HERE
IN COTONOU FOR OUR USE.

4- WE ARE GOING TO GET LEGAL DOCUMENTS TO BACK UP THE TRANSFER.THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS
ARE THE LETTER OF ADMINISTRATION AND AFFIDAVIT OF FACT/CLAIM.  THE AFFIDAVIT OF
FACTS, WILL STATE THE FACT THAT YOU ARE THE LEGAL BENEFICIARY AND NEXT OF KIN TO
LATE MR PAL. WHILE THE LETTER OF ADMINISTRATION WILL STATE THAT LATE MR PAL DIED
WITHOUT A"WILL" THESE DOCUMENTS WILL CONFIRM AND AUTHENTICATE OUR CLAIMS THAT YOU
ARE THE BENEFICIARY OF THE MONEY AND NEXT OF KIN TO MR DESTIN PAL. THIS WILL COST ME
MONEY BECAUSE I WILL PAY A HIGH COURT ATTORNEY TO GET THESE DOCUMENTS FOR OUR USE.
THIS IS ALSO THE REASON WHY I NEED YOUR ADDRESS AS THE LAWYER WILL NEED IT FOR THE
PROCESSING OF THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS.

5- WE WILL GET APPROVAL FROM THE FEDERAL MINISTRY OF WORKS AND APPROVAL FOR FOREIGN
EXCHANGE ALLOCATION FROM THE FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND I WILL PAY TAX TO THE
BOARD OF REVENUE. THIS WILL ALSO COST ME MONEY. IN THIS COUNTRY OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS
CANNOT BE OBTAINED WITHOUT GIVING BRIBES/TIPS OR GRATIFICATION ESPECIALLY IN THIS
MATTER WHERE IT INVOLVES TRANSFER OF LARGE SUMS OF MONEY.

6- YOU WILL BE PRESENTED AS THE BENEFICIARY OF THE FUNDS TO THE BANK BACKED UP BY
THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS FROM THE HIGH COURT HERE.

7- YOU WILL BE REQUIRED TO GO TO HOLLAND OR GHANA TO SIGN THE FUND RELEASE ORDER
DOCUMENTS (FRO) AND STAMP DUTY WILL ALSO BE REQUIRED.

AFTER PAYING THE STAMP DUTY FEE TO THE BANK, SIGNING OF THE "FRO" WILL TAKE PLACE
IMMEDIATELY BECUASE IT IS VERY IMPORTANT AND WITHOUT IT THE MONEY WILL NOT BE
TRANSFERRED, AS IT ORIGINATED FROM CONTRACTS. IN CASE YOU MAY NOT BE DISPOSED TO
COME IN PERSON TO THE BANK FOR THE SIGNING, YOU CAN HIRE AN ACCREDITED ATTORNEY TO
THE BANK TO ACT ON YOUR BEHALF BY SIGNING ALL THE NECESSARY TRANSFER ORDER DOCUMENTS
AS YOU WOULD HAVE PROBABLY DONE IF PHYSICALLY PRESENT

IN THIS CASE TOO, THE ACCREDITED LAWYER WILL CHARGE YOU A MINIMAL FEE FOR
REPRESENTING YOU.

8- THEN THE MONEY($45,000,000) WILL BE FINALLY WIRED TO YOUR ACCOUNT.

9- I WILL THEN RESIGN MY POSITION IN THE BANK, GET MY TRAVEL DOCUMENTS, FLY INTO
YOUR COUNTRY AND JOIN YOU FOR SHARING AND INVESTMENT OF THE FUNDS.

NOTE: TO GET THE LEGAL PAPERS/APPROVALS WILL COST ME

MONEY. ESTIMATED AMOUNT IS ABOUT $65,000. I DO NOT HAVE THE COMPLETE AMOUNT BUT I
WILL BORROW OR EVEN SELL MY PROPERTY TO MAKE IT UP. I WILL INITIATE ACTIONS TO THIS
EFFECT ON YOUR POSITIVE RESPONSE. ALL EXPENSES WILL BE RECORDED AND REIMBURSED
BEFORE WE SHARE THE MONEY.

I WILL LIKE TO KNOW MORE ABOUT YOU,BECAUSE I WANT TO KNOW IF YOU CAN HANDLE AND
MANAGE THIS FUNDS FOR ME AS REGARDS INVESTMENTS.

I AM 50 YEARS OLD, MARRIED WITH THREE CHILDREN.I AM THE DISTRICT 096 COMMISSIONER OF
ROTARY CLUB.

I AM APPEALING TO YOU,I HAVE MY FAMILY AND LOTS OF DEPENDANTS WHO STILL NEEDS MY
PATERNAL CARE.

I AM GOING INTO THIS TRANSACTION JUST BECAUSE,OUR PENSION SCHEME IN THIS COUNTRY IS
HOPELESS AFTER RETIREMENT.

SECONDLY IF THIS FUNDS ARE NOT CLAIMED THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL SHARE IT AMONG
THEMSELVES.

THIRDLY I WANT TO BETTER THE LIFE OF MY CHILDREN AND THE LESS PRIVCILEDGED IN THE
SOCIETY ABROAD.

THE ONLY PROBLEM I KNOW WE MIGHT HAVE IS THAT YOU MIGHT NOT TRUST ME ENOUGH BECAUSE
OF THE HIGH RATE OF SCAM IN THE GLOBAL WORLD,BUT I AM ASSURING YOU THAT SCAM IS FOR
THOSE WHO DONT EARN A LIVING AND UNEMPLOYED.

I AM A BANKER BUT I WANT TO BETTER MY LIFE AFTER RETIREMENT.

I HAVE TAKING EVERY PRECAUTIONARY MEASURES BEFORE INITIATING ABOUT THIS TRANSACTIO
AND I KNOW AS MY GOD HAVE DIRECTED ME THAT YOU WILL NOT LET MEW DOWN.

I AM WAITING FOR YOUR POSITIVE RESPONSE.

MY REGARDS TOI YOUR FAMILY GOD BLESS YOU.

REGARDS,

MR LEONARD KUJO.

messages.subject: WHAT IS GOING ON?
messages.body:
Mr Leonard,

My child, I do indeed have your emails and wish to proceed with this good work but
your habit of writing everything in CAPITALS is most disconcerting. And there really
are many words in your emails.

messages.subject: Our telephone conversation
messages.body:
Paul, my dear child,

I very much enjoyed our telephone conversation. I was surprised to get your call
relating to these funds especially after Mr Leonard Kujo hasnt contacted me for
almost a month.

Mrs Donkeykong and I have been worrying about Leonard. Please tell us how he is now.
Is his health any better?

You know he is an alcoholic and left me stranded with $15,000 cash in my pocket and
an unused ticket to Ghana?

Please tell Leonard to email me. We really would like him to come to visit us here
in East Weestain to recuperate and take shelter in the wings of our Master. But more
importantly we need to hear from him that he is OK.

With regard to our conversation please can you once more outline the process as it
stands now? I think I am confused after our conversation.

Your call came at the right time. We were just planning to sell Mrs Donkeykongs
car. It is a rather nice Porsche Boxster S in British Racing Green with the
Tiptronic S gearbox. We bought it last month, thinking we were soon to get a share
in Leonards funds.

I am sorry I get very confused on the phone, which is why I prefer email. When is it
you need me in South Africa? Please remind me what airport?

I am looking forward to a visit again to South Africa. It is many years since I have
had the opportunity to see my teacher Bishop Juan King. He runs one of our orders
orphanages and is a true servant of the Lord. Do you know the "The Orphanage of Juan
King"? They do magnificent work.

I look forward to your email reply with the details. I will book my flight just as
soon as I hear from you.

messages.subject: Our telephone conversation
messages.body:
Paul, my dear child,

You gave me the wrong email address. I am pleased you have now provided me with your
working address.

Please be aware that I get very flustered on the telephone and far prefer to deal
with an important matter like this by email where I can read carefully and digest
the contents.

I can confirm that the details you have for me are correct.

I copy below the email I sent yesterday and I look forward to hearing back from
you.

==================================

I very much enjoyed our telephone conversation. I was surprised to get your call
relating to these funds especially after Mr Leonard Kujo hasnt contacted me for
almost a month.

Mrs Donkeykong and I have been worrying about Leonard. Please tell us how he is now.
Is his health any better?

You know he is an alcoholic and left me stranded with $15,000 cash in my pocket and
an unused ticket to Ghana?

Please tell Leonard to email me. We really would like him to come to visit us here
in East Weestain to recuperate and take shelter in the wings of our Master. But more
importantly we need to hear from him that he is OK.

With regard to our conversation please can you once more outline the process as it
stands now? I think I am confused after our conversation.

Your call came at the right time. We were just planning to sell Mrs Donkeykongs
car. It is a rather nice Porsche Boxster S in British Racing Green with the
Tiptronic S gearbox. We bought it last month, thinking we were soon to get a share
in Leonards funds.

I am sorry I get very confused on the phone, which is why I prefer email. When is it
you need me in South Africa? Please remind me what airport?

I am looking forward to a visit again to South Africa. It is many years since I have
had the opportunity to see my teacher Bishop Juan King. He runs one of our orders
orphanages and is a true servant of the Lord. Do you know the "The Orphanage of Juan
King"? They do magnificent work.

I look forward to your email reply with the details. I will book my flight just as
soon as I hear from you.

Leonard, my child, how nice to hear from you again.

Mrs Donkeykong and myself are most concerned about your drinking problem and when we
didn't hear from you we figured that you must have drunk yourself in to an early
grave.

Mrs Donkeykong will be delighted that you are still alive as she has been praying
for your salvation. Please reassure us as to your health.

We are now concluding this deal with a very nice Mr Paul Maga and everything is
going very well.

severe and unpredictable we think it would be best if we continued to transact this
deal through Mr Maga. I know you will see the wisdom in this decision.

open. We think the country air will do you some good and you will be amongst friends
who will be able to help you with your weakness for the bottle.

messages.subject: Johannesburg International Airport
messages.body:
Paul, my child,

You won't believe just how hectic my life is at the moment. I've had a sudden rush
on weddings and it looks like I'm fully booked for the next week as well.

On top of this Mrs Donkeykong was caught on speed camera doing 147mph on a 60mph B
road in her Porsche Boxster S. It looks like she may loose her licence to drive as
well as face a heavy fine.

I'm hoping the court will accept my religious authority when I testify that she was
possessed by evil demons at the time, which I have since exorcised.

Anyway, enough of my worries. How are you doing? I hope the Creator of all things is
being kind to you and your family.

You will be please to hear that, although there is a delay, I have now booked my
flight. My flight details are as follows:

Departs London (LHR) 21 JUL 21:00
Arrives Johannesburg (JNB) 22 JUL 09:15
Flight Number VS601  Virgin Atlantic

So I am arriving on Tuesday 22nd July at 9.15 in the morning and I'll be on Virgin
Atlantic flight VS601

Bishop Juan King wants me to go to him straight away but I told him I had important
business first. So I am in your hands. Before I make my way to the orphanage of Juan
King I will meet you at the airport to conclude this transaction.

Please make sure you are there at the airport to guide me and please book any hotels
if you believe the transaction will go into that night.

Paul, please be aware that I do not like to travel in my dog collar as people pester
me with their problems. I will be wearing a plain suit. My eyesight is not good so
can I suggest you carry a large card with my surname on it so that I may recognise
you.
Paul. my child, please let me know if these arrangements are to your liking.

Rev Wally Tightnuts

messages.subject: Re: My arrival in South Africa
messages.body:
Paul, my child,

Thank you for your email below. I am much relieved that you will be meeting me in
the airport.

Bishop Juan King is most concerned and wanted me to go straight to him before our
meeting. He doesn't exactly know our business but does know that I have business to
do first. He is well versed in African affairs and wanted to know all about it. I
told him that I would tell him when I meet him in person, which I will as he is a
friend and I trust him completely.

He suggests that many many foreigners are robbed and mugged around Johannesburg and
this worries me greatly.

Please make sure you are at the airport early and that you are waiting for me at
arrivals right at the front. I am concerned that I will be carrying a lot of money
and I will only feel safe if yours is the first face I see at arrivals.

Please carry a large sign with my surname on (TIGHTNUTS). If I don't see you I will
be very nervous indeed and will certainly take a taxi straight to my friend the
Bishop. I will not wait around and look for you with that much money on me.

Paul my child - Please assure me that you will be there at the front waiting with a
clear sign.

Just to remind you again my flight details are as follows:

Departs London (LHR) Monday Evening 21 JUL 21:00
Arrives Johannesburg (JNB) Tuesday Morning 22 JUL 09:15
Flight Number VS601 Virgin Atlantic

Please mail me back with your reassurance.

Rev Wally Tightnuts

messages.subject: Most Upset
messages.body:
My Children,

Bishop Juan King has now managed to get me connected to the Internet and my email.

May I start by saying that I am very disappointed and confused. I came out of
departures and there was no one in sight to meet me. This, despite Paul's assurances
that I would be looked after.

I am pleased to report that, despite my fears, I am both safe and comfortable and
the Bishop is looking after me very well indeed. The considerable sum of money is
safely locked away. The orphanage of Juan King is a very special place and I am
enthralled by the kindness and beauty.

I await your contact but it is only fair to warn you that I have my doubts about
this whole transaction now. The Bishop is pleading with me not to contact you as he
feels that you may be fraudsters and that I have had a lucky escape. He really
believes that you were preparing to kidnap me and do unspeakable things to my
genitalia with electrodes. He knows about these things apparently.

Anyway despite his protestations I am once again making contact and await your
explanation for abandoning me at the Airport.

Rev Wally Tightnuts
